questions.question: Which country was recently hit by 'Cyclone Ilsa'?

Who has been named as the national ambassador for TB Mukt Bharat Campaign?
Who is the only living Indian to win the Grammy Award three?
Which state has created a memorial for rhinos using ashes named as 'Abode of the Unicorns'?

When 9000 is added to a certain number the sum will be 12998. The number is ______.

The number just more than 4306 which is divisible by 5 is ______.
What is the product of all odd numbers between 6 and 10?

Shakti has a container weighing 4 kg 220 g. What is the weight of 4 such containers?
Veena wants to convert 6000 mg into kg so 6000 mg = ______ kg.
Which of the following is a leap year?
Rahul, a researcher spent 98 days to study the Jantar Mantar Delhi. How many weeks did he spend there?
A line which cuts a pair of parallel lines is called ______.
An angle whose value is ______ is called complete angle.
How many ₹5 coins will you get for a ₹50 note?
In Multiplication, the result we get is called ______.
How many lakhs make a million?
1 Century = ______ years.
4 hrs is equal to ______ minutes.
The concept of Zero was introduced by ______.
